info.title: U.S. EPA Enforcement and Compliance History Online (ECHO) - Code Lookups
info.description:
Enforcement and Compliance History Online (ECHO) is a tool developed and maintained by EPA's Office of Enforcement and Compliance Assurance for public use. ECHO provides integrated compliance and enforcement information for about 800,000 regulated facilities nationwide.


Additional ECHO Resources: [Web Services](https://echo.epa.gov/tools/web-services), [About ECHO's Data](https://echo.epa.gov/resources/echo-data/about-the-data), [Data Downloads](https://echo.epa.gov/tools/data-downloads).

contact.name: US EPA, OECA Integration, Targeting and Access Branch

property.Category.title: Category
property.Category.description: A code that uniquely identifies a category of Supplemental Environment Project (SEP) for a settlement (e.g., Assessments and Audits, Environmental Compliance Promotion, Emergency Planning and Preparedness, Environmental Restoration).

property.Message.title: Message
property.Message.description: Field to record messages (typically performance-related) about packet processing.

property.Program.title: Program
property.Program.description: The source database for the EPA programs information.

property.Statute.title: Statute
property.Statute.description:
The name of the statute associated with each of the permits and identifiers linked to the facility: 
* CAA = the Clean Air Act
* CWA = the Clean Water Act
* RCRA = the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act
* EP313 = the Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 (also known as the Toxics Release Inventory Program)
* TSCA = the Toxic Substances Control Act
* SDWA = the Safe Drinking Water Act

property.ValueLongDesc.title: ValueLongDesc
property.ValueLongDesc.example: All phosphorus and phosphate pollutant parameters. Section 3.1.3 of the Technical Users Background Document for the DMR Pollutant Loading Tool describes how the Loading Tool identifies phosphorus parameters and aggregates phosphorus loads.

rb.callback.title: callback
rb.callback.description: JSONP Callback.  For use with JSONP and GEOJSONP output only.  Enter a name of the function in which to wrap the JSON response.

rb.descending.LOOKUP.title: descending
rb.descending.LOOKUP.description: Output Sort Column Descending Flag.  Enter Y to sort results in descending order.

rb.output.title: output
rb.output.description:
Output Format Flag.  Enter one of the following keywords:
* JSON = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation (default).
* JSONP = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation with Padding.  
* XML = Data model formatted as Extensible Markup Language.

rb.search_code.title: search_code
rb.search_code.description: Enter a partial or complete code value.

rb.search_subcode.title: search_subcode
rb.search_subcode.description: Enter a partial or complete code value.

rb.search_term.title: search_term
rb.search_term.description: Enter a partial or complete search phrase or word.

rb.wbd_level.title: wbd_level
rb.wbd_level.description: The number of digits of the watershed code [Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC)] returned in the ValueCode. Must be an even number between 4 and 12.

rest_lookups.bio_mgmt_practice_typesubty.title: Bio Mgmt Practice Type Subtype Results

rest_lookups.ecatt_most_rcnt_cmmn_yr.Res.title: ECATT Most Recent Common Year Results

schema.title: Bio Mgmt Practice Type Subtype Root
Bio Mgmt Practice Type Subtype Root

rest_lookups.bp_tribes.default.description: Returns an array of tribes containing the search term. If search term not provided, returns all values.

rest_lookups.cp_citations.default.description: Returns an array of information based on search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values. ValueCode is always null.

rest_lookups.cwa_parameters.default.description: Returns an array of parameter codes and descriptions that contain the search_term or search_code entered. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values. ValueCode is the 5-digit parameter code.

rest_lookups.cwa_pollutants.default.description: Returns an array of water polluntants containing search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values.

schema.title: ECATT Most Recent Common Year Root
ECATT Most Recent Common Year Root

rest_lookups.federal_agencies.default.description: Returns an array of federal agency codes and their descriptions.

rest_lookups.ghg_fac_types.default.description: Returns an array of Green House Gas Facility Type codes and descriptions  based on the provided search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values.

rest_lookups.ghg_subparts.default.description: Results are an array of Green House Gas Subpart codes and descriptions that meet the selection criteria.  If no criteria is provided, all codes and descriptions are returned.

rest_lookups.icis_inspection_types.defau.description: Returns an array of icis_inspection_types codes and their description. If search term or search code is  not provided, all values are returned.

rest_lookups.icis_law_sections.default.description: Returns an array of icis_inspection_types codes and their description. If search term or search code is  not provided, all values are returned.

rest_lookups.naics_codes.default.description: Returns an array of NAICS codes and descriptions based on search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values.

rest_lookups.nei_pollutants.default.description: Returns an array of air polluntants containing search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values.

rest_lookups.nei_years.default.description: Returns an array of air polluntants containing search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values.

rest_lookups.npdes_parameters.default.description: Returns an array of NPDES Parameter Codes and their description that meet the search term. If the search term is not provided, returns all values.

rest_lookups.rpo_regions.default.description: Returns an array of Regional Planning Organizations based on search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values.

rest_lookups.sdwa_contaminants.default.description: Returns an array of SDWA contaminants containing search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values.

rest_lookups.sdwis_tribes.default.description: Returns an array of tribes containing the search term. If search term not provided, returns all values.

rest_lookups.tri_pollutants.default.description: Returns an array of air polluntants containing search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values.

rest_lookups.wbd_code_lu.default.description: Returns an array of WBD names and codes based on the WBD code and WBD level provided. If WBD Code not provided, returns all values. ValueCode is the WBD Code containing the number of digits provided in the WBD level.

rest_lookups.wbd_name_lu.default.description: Returns an array of WBD names and codes based on the WBD name and WBD level provided. ValueCode is the WBD Code containing the number of digits provided in the WBD level.

Output Format Flag.  Enter one of the following keywords:
* JSON = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation (default).
* JSONP = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation with Padding.  
* XML = Data model formatted as Extensible Markup Language.
